name: Magic Fairy Tale
description:
A new anime-styled shooter known as Fairy Tale Busters entered by ELMUNDOPLAY.COM Fairytale Shooter is a fun addictive offline game, a great way to spend some free time and relax.

Rescue princess Marivi in a lost fantasy world full of mystical adventures! Collect the hidden objects, earn money and unlock every weapon world with 5 special keys.
